revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Pace |model=5168NV |fcc_date=11/04/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=dsl modem,wireless router |fcc_id=PGR2W5100 |ic_id=3439B-5100 |us_id=6KRDL02BTW5100 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=64 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+, block diagram |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=PACEXXX |default_ssid_regex=^PACE[0-9A-F]{3}$ |oui=AC:5D:10 |oui_eth=AC:5D:10 }} {{TagLine|Wireless 802.11N uDSL Residential Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/5168nv-xdsl-voice-gateway/}} (Arris)
*5168NV XDSL VOICE GATEWAY :VDSL2, ADSL2+ Gateway with 802.11n Wi-Fi & HomePNA<small> :Dual-core processor with hardware accelerated routing for exceptional performance. :High-powered 802.11n 2x2 MIMO wireless technology virtually eliminates wireless. :Enable Gigabit service offerings utilizing the integrated Gigabit Ethernet switch. </small> Additional models states in the manual include.. *5168NV, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5168N, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5138NV, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5138N, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5133NV, uDSL - no HPNA - WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5133N, uDSL - no HPNA - WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5108NV, Ethernet WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5108N, Ethernet WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn
The label states a sample SSID as '''PACE0AB'''. '''0AB''' is also printed on the sample :label as the last three hex digits of the router serial number. The manual states the default IP is 192.168.1.254. :Appears to be [[Broadcom]] based (5111NV [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1574863 block diagram])
*[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/Pace-5168NV-h4059 ''Pace 5168NV'' on '''DSLReports'''] *[https://kb.intermedia.net/Article/2926 ''Pace 5168NV'' on '''InterMedia''']
